en.allNamesSeen: You've seen all available names for this filter! The list has been reset.
en.subHeading: Discover creative, fun names for your furry friend. Generate, explore, and save your favorites.
en.discoverSubtitle: Generate fun and creative names for your best friend
en.quizSubtitle: Find the perfect style for your pet.
en.whyLoveSubtitle: More than just a name list - we help you find names with personality, style, and a perfect fit for your pet.
en.featureCreativeText: Every name comes with a fun description to help you choose one with personality.
en.featureSharingText: Share your favorite pet names with family and friends and decide together.
en.featurePersonalizedText: Filter by sex, style, and personality to find names that perfectly match your pet.
en.footerCopyright: ¬© 2025 Pawsome Pet Names. All rights reserved.
en.noNamesFound: No names found for this filter combination.
en.shareNameText: How about this name for our pet? %name% - "%meaning%". Found it on the Pawsome Pet Names website!
en.clearConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear your entire list of favorite names?
en.quizGenderTitle: First, who is the name for?
en.quizSuggestionsTitle: Based on your style, here are 5 suggestions:
en.q1_question: What kind of vibe does your pet have?
en.q1_opt2: Goofy, playful, and always causing trouble.
en.q2_opt1: A foodie, always begging for snacks.
en.q2_opt2: A nature lover, fascinated by plants and bugs.
en.q3_opt1: Like a famous movie or book character.
en.q4_question: You prefer a name that is:
en.q4_opt1: Clearly a 'human' name, like Kevin or Jessica.
en.q4_opt2: Definitely a 'pet' name, like Rex or Mittens.
en.q5_question: Your ideal name would come from:
en.q5_opt1: Something funny that makes people laugh.
en.q5_opt2: The world of fantasy, sci-fi, or video games.
en.q5_opt3: A classic name that everyone recognizes.
en.style_classic_desc: You appreciate names that feel familiar and friendly. You're drawn to beloved pet names that have been popular for generations, like Max, Bella, or Rocky.
en.style_modern_desc: You love a name that brings a smile! You're drawn to funny words, food items, and silly concepts that perfectly capture your pet's goofy personality.
en.style_nature_desc: Your pet is a hero! You love names from movies, series, and games. Whether it's from Star Wars or Marvel, you want a name with an epic backstory.
en.style_romantic_desc: You see your pet as part of the family. You prefer regular human names that are charming and give your pet a relatable, down-to-earth personality.
en.listCopiedToast: List copied to clipboard! You can now paste it wherever you want.
en.coupleModeIntroDesc: Start a session and share the code with your partner. Like names separately, and we'll show you the ones you both love!
en.coupleModeDisclaimer: Important: The session and its liked names will be automatically deleted after 30 days of inactivity. Be sure to write down your matches elsewhere!
en.createSessionDesc: Share this code with your partner. When they join, you can start liking names to find your matches!
en.invalidCodeError: Invalid or expired code. Please try again.
en.coupleModeTip: Tip: For better matches, try using the same Style and Pet filters!
